intro: Rosa × convinciens, commonly known as the double-flowered pink hybrid rose, is a botanical cultivar resulting from the crossbreeding of different Rosa species. It is characterized by its lush, full blooms that typically feature multiple layers of petals, giving it a丰满 and ornamental appearance. The plant is a deciduous shrub that thrives in temperate climates, producing fragrant flowers in shades of pink, red, and white. It requires well-drained soil and partial to full sunlight to flourish. Its botanical significance lies in its role as a popular ornamental plant in gardens and its genetic contribution to the development of modern rose cultivars.
